comments.creator: mars.martian+bugmail@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
At the URL I command-clicked inside the "Community" box to select it and then scrolled the page. Before scrolling, the "Examples" box was not shown but afterwards it was. After scrolling, it appeared that the "Documentation" and "Examples" were selected along with the "Community" box.

It lead to the weird rendering in the screenshot.
comments.text:
Created attachment 524277
Screenshot of problem.

At the URL I command-clicked inside the "Community" box to select it and then scrolled the page. Before scrolling, the "Examples" box was not shown but afterwards it was. After scrolling, it appeared that the "Documentation" and "Examples" were selected along with the "Community" box.

It lead to the weird rendering in the screenshot.
comments.author: mars.martian+bugmail@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
In a current Nightly build http://nightly.mozilla.org/
The table cell is correctly painted when selected, but when clicking outside it
(resetting the selection) it leaves behind some of the "selection border".
Forcing the window to repaint fixes the issue.
comments.text:
